user_message: hello there! today i have mixed feelings, I thought my wife would be happy about creating a therapeutic tool but she didnt react as expected, maybe because she is scared of current LLMs and other technological tools that might allow techno feudalism and extraction
dae_response:
Hey there, I'm so glad you reached out! 🤔 It sounds like you're feeling a bit of uncertainty and maybe even some anxiety about your wife's reaction to the therapeutic tool you're creating. That can be really tough to navigate. Can you tell me more about what was going through your mind when she didn't react as expected? What were you're hoping for, and what did you see happening instead? (Also, I want to acknowledge that it takes a lot of courage to share something like this, especially when it involves vulnerability and potentially sensitive topics. I'm here to listen and offer support in any way I can. ) 🌿.
